mapper.select: select u.create_time, u.id_no, i.company_name, s.title, s.img_src_list, u.deal_price, u.is_cancel, u.is_after_sales, u.order_status, u.token from user_order u, service_provider_service s, service_provider_identification_company i where u.employ_user_id = #{employUserId} and u.service_id = s.id and u.provider_user_id = i.user_id limit #{begin}, #{onePageSize}

select u.create_time, u.id_no, i.name, s.title, s.img_src_list, u.deal_price, u.is_cancel, u.is_after_sales, u.order_status, u.token from user_order u, service_provider_service s, service_provider_identification_person i where u.employ_user_id = #{employUserId} and u.service_id = s.id and u.provider_user_id = i.user_id limit #{begin}, #{onePageSize}

select u.create_time, u.id_no, i.company_name, s.title, s.img_src_list, u.deal_price, u.is_cancel, u.is_after_sales, u.order_status, u.token from user_order u, service_provider_service s, service_provider_identification_company i where u.employ_user_id = #{employUserId} and s.title like #{queryKey} and u.service_id = s.id and u.provider_user_id = i.user_id limit #{begin}, #{onePageSize}
select count(*) from user_order u, service_provider_service s where u.employ_user_id = #{employUserId} and s.title like #{queryKey} and u.service_id = s.id
